references.paper_title: Adapting to online label shift with provable guarantees
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical analysis of online label shift, which is highly relevant to the continual test-time adaptation problem addressed in the current work.
This paper introduces the iWildCam dataset used for real-world evaluation in the current research, demonstrating the practical applicability of the proposed algorithm.
This paper provides a theoretical framework for non-stationary optimization, which is essential for understanding the challenges of continual test-time adaptation in non-stationary environments.
This paper introduces contrastive test-time adaptation, a closely related approach that also focuses on adapting models to new environments using unlabeled data.
